description: Secure config with minimal issues - tests false positive rate

comparison.summary: Haiku 2.41x faster, 26x cheaper. Sonnet provided security validation report even when minimal issues.

accuracy.notes: Both correctly recognized secure configuration. No false positives from either model.

completeness.notes: Sonnet praised security practices and provided continued hardening recommendations. Haiku concise validation.

actionability.notes: Haiku: 'Good job, one minor tweak.' Sonnet: Detailed security maturity roadmap for further improvement.

clarity.notes: Haiku perfectly concise for low-issue scans. Sonnet thorough but may be overkill for clean configs.

false_positive_rate.notes: Both models correctly identified this as a secure configuration with minimal real issues.
